title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid email and password credentials and appropriate role-based access is granted.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and password
Click the login button
User is successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard with UI elements visible according to their role (Vale or Armador)

title: User Authentication Failure
description: Verify that login fails if incorrect email or password is entered and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid email or password
Click the login button
Login attempt fails and error message is displayed without granting access

title: Dashboard KPI Display
description: Verify that the dashboard correctly displays KPIs including total orders, pending payments, revenue, expiration alerts, and trends with correct filters.

steps.description: Login as user with dashboard access
Navigate to the dashboard page
Check that total orders, pending payments, revenue, and expirations are correctly displayed
Apply different temporal filters to KPIs
Verify that trend graphs update accordingly with filtered data

title: Order Creation and Keyword Search
description: Verify users can create orders and use keyword-based search with AND logic across multiple fields to find existing orders.

steps.description: Login as order handler
Access order creation interface and create a new order with valid data
New order is created and visible in order list
Use keyword search input with multiple tokens
Results include orders matching all input keywords across relevant fields

title: Order Workflow State Transitions
description: Validate order state progression through states: In Assembly -> Assembled -> Controlled/Invoiced -> In Dispatch -> Delivered/Paid with all business rules and conflict of interest checks enforced.

steps.description: Create or select an order in 'In Assembly' state
Attempt to advance order to 'Assembled' without complete picking
Advance prevented with validation error on incomplete picking
Complete picking and advance order to 'Assembled'
Advance order to 'Controlled/Invoiced' ensuring no conflict of interest in control
Order state changes successfully with audit log including user and timestamp
Advance order through 'In Dispatch' to 'Delivered/Paid' and record payment status
Order completion is logged and payment discrepancies are flagged as needed

title: Inventory Inbound Approval Process
description: Verify inventory inbounds can be registered and require approval before stock levels are updated.

steps.description: Login as inventory manager
Register a new inbound shipment at LLERENA warehouse
Inbound shows as pending approval and does not affect stock immediately
Approve inbound shipment
Stock levels are updated accordingly and approval is logged

title: Inventory Manual Stock Adjustment
description: Validate manual stock adjustments can be performed for discrepancies with proper validations and audit trail.

steps.description: Login as inventory manager
Select stock item in BETBEDER warehouse and perform manual stock adjustment with positive and negative values
Stock is adjusted accordingly and adjustment reason and user details are logged
Attempt to adjust stock resulting in negative stock quantity
Adjustment prevented with validation error

title: Inter-Warehouse Stock Transfer with Validation
description: Verify transfer between LLERENA and BETBEDER validates availability and updates stocks correctly.

steps.description: Login as inventory manager
Initiate transfer of stock item from LLERENA to BETBEDER exceeding available quantity
Transfer blocked due to insufficient stock
Initiate valid stock transfer within available limits
Stock levels updated correctly in both warehouses with transaction logged

title: Blind Stock Audit with Dual Participants
description: Ensure blind stock audits require two participants and prevent audit completion if data is inconsistent.

steps.description: Login as inventory manager
Start blind stock audit requiring two participants
First participant enters stock counts
Second participant enters stock counts
System compares both entries and flags discrepancies
Attempt to complete audit despite unresolved discrepancies
Audit completion blocked until conflicts are resolved

title: Financial Payment Record and Progress Tracking
description: Verify financial staff can update payments to suppliers and monitor payment progress against targets with priority and profile rules.

steps.description: Login as financial staff
Update payment state for supplier invoices
Payment state updated and reflected in progress tracking dashboards
Modify payment priorities and bank account details
System uses updated priorities to order payment processing and stores bank details securely

title: Master Data CRUD Operations and Bulk Price Updates
description: Validate CRUD functions for clients, suppliers, articles, and price lists and test bulk price updates with commercial rounding.

steps.description: Login as user with master data permissions
Create, edit, view, and delete a client record
Operations succeed and data consistency is maintained
Perform bulk price updates on multiple articles applying commercial rounding rules to nearest 50
Prices updated correctly with verified rounding

title: Operational Utilities Access and Usage
description: Verify access restrictions on SQL editor and usability of label maker, budget estimator, price list snapshot, and settings management.

steps.description: Login as normal operational user
Attempt to access SQL editor
Access denied or hidden if role lacks permission
Access label maker, generate labels with configurable prices and discounts
Labels generated correctly and exportable as PDF
Use budget estimator with valid inputs
Estimates match expected calculations
Generate price list snapshot formatted for messaging
Snapshot data matches current prices and is formatted properly
Update app settings and save changes
Settings persist and take effect correctly

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify module and UI visibility matches user role permissions and unauthorized actions are blocked.

steps.description: Login as Vale role
Modules and features allowed for Vale are visible and accessible; others are hidden or disabled
Login as Armador role
Modules and features allowed for Armador are visible and accessible; others are hidden or disabled
Attempt to access unauthorized modules by URL hacking
Access denied or redirected to error page

title: Data Integrity with Cascading Deletions and History Logging
description: Ensure deletions cascade correctly on related entities and order state changes log history with user and timestamp.

steps.description: Delete a client that has associated orders
Cascade deletion or proper restriction prevents orphaned data
Change order state through workflow
History record created with state, user info, and timestamp

title: UI Export Functions Produce Proper PDF and Excel Files
description: Verify export functionality for reports and labels produces correctly formatted PDF and Excel respecting locale and data formatting.

steps.description: Generate export of price list snapshot to PDF
PDF file downloads properly formatted with correct locale number and date formats
Export financial reports to Excel
Excel file contains accurate data and formatting consistent with locale rules
